stimulusHtml: Which of the following actions would cause a clockwise current to be induced in the loop?

features.html: A rectangular conducting loop is located above a long, straight wire carrying a current I to the right, as shown. The wire and loop are both in the plane of the page.

choicesHtml: Moving the loop to the right
Moving the loop out of the page while keeping the same orientation
Moving the loop away from the wire
Moving the loop toward the wire
